column6: Perfect for ACU events: WALK to Summit, Homecoming, Sing Song, and Graduation! \nClose to Hendrick Hospital & Dyess. Perfect for Professionals, Traveling Nurses, Writers, & their FAMILIES. ALL amenities are provided: Housekeeper, Gardener, Property Manager. Complete turn-key living. Good place for kids and pets (dogs). See Ravenshire-LLC for more information.
column9: Ravenshire-LLC Retreat -- Mi Casa es tu Casa
